forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 10 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun begins its slow descent over Downtown San Francisco, the air is gently stirred by a cool breeze from the west, hinting at the approach of evening. Currently, the horizon is painted in soft tones, marking the transition from day to night amidst a partly cloudy sky. The temperature is settling around a comforting 52 degrees, inviting you to bundle up just a touch without sacrificing comfort. The gusting winds, reaching up to 21 mph, add a playful note to the evening—a reminder of the city’s dynamic coastal character.

Looking at what lies ahead for Wednesday, the forecast promises a delightful blend of sun—a high around 61 degrees beckons for leisurely strolls or casual gatherings. While the morning may greet you with a light marine layer, it is expected to lift, revealing expansive blue skies and a vista unmarred by fog. In this splendid weather, you might consider wrapping yourself comfortably in layers: a light sweater or a chic jacket, perfect against the cool winds, will serve you well while you explore the charm of outdoor cafes or take a thoughtful walk along the waterfront, soaking in the vibrant life of the city as it unwinds into the evening.
